text: maryaminre makan isa paranna sandarbhavum (srad'dheyamakunnu:) israyil santatikale, enikku mumpulla terattine satyappetuttunnavanayikkeantum, enikk sesam varunna ahmad ennuperulla oru dutanepparri santeasavartta ariyikkunnavanayikkeantum ninnalilekk allahuvinre dutanayi niyeagikkappettavanakunnu nan. annane addeham vyaktamaya telivukalum keant avarute atutt cennappeal avar parannu: it vyaktamaya jalavidyayakunnu
